title: Little Ger, Slow Life in Another World - Novel Updates
genre: Fantasy   Romance   Shounen Ai   Slice of Life
tags: Absent Parents   Ancient Times   Caring Protagonist   Clever Protagonist   Cooking   Doting Love Interests   Farming   Hard-Working Protagonist   Heartwarming   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Mpreg   Pets   Poor to Rich   Slow Growth at Start   Slow Romance   Transmigration
author: J112233
description:
Miao He became a ger, got married to a striking young man, and also tried to be unfaithful, somewhat troubling. Nevertheless, life still has to be lived comfortably. Secretly grow vegetables, eat and drink well, and have a pretty simple life.

Miao He said to his finger: … (What to do? This person is pretty good.)

Yang Dalang: …(Little brother is scared)

Golden Finger & Dabai: (Don’t ignore us!)>
